storyInfo: Deepcolor receives a painting and begins a searching journey, following the painting's clues.

attributes.content: Tick, tock...
Brush, draw...
Tick, tock...
Hello! You've got a package!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: Please leave it at the door, thank you.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: No problem!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: And now I've forgotten what I was going to draw...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Never mind. I'll think about it later.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: I should see what's in this package.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: A painting?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: But I make paintings, not buy them. Who is it from?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Strange. There's no sender or recipient.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Deepcolor knows, however, that it is meant for her.
Everything about it is familiar, from the colors to the texture.
Thank you, whoever sent it.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: She leaves it by the easel, and resumes her painting.
She eventually finishes her latest work, but it is not the image she had envisioned. It is a reproduction of the 'painting.'
She finds her attention constantly drawn to that curious sense of familiarity, her eyes wandering from the canvas, her mind recreating the colors in its frame...
Maybe it's time for a break.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: So many visitors today...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: And what do you want?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: To watch you draw. Any new paintings today?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: But there's something on the canvas.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: A stream, a forest, a wooden hut?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: It's a reproduction. Someone sent me a painting, and it was all I could think of, so I just copied it.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Copying is painting too.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: The ideas and techniques aren't mine. It's just practice; the painting doesn't belong to me.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: That doesn't make a difference to me. I like it, as long as it's information that you painted with your own hand using your own brush and paint.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Anyway, I'm not painting today. Go.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: What is it? You're entranced by the painting too?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: It feels... familiar.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Don't you think so?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Yes, that sense of familiarity is what's preventing me from moving my brush. You can take it if you want.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: But you've already seen it. Would me taking it change anything?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: I suppose not...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: What do we do, then?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Investigate? Explore?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: No choice, I suppose... as you say.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Let's go!
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Hey, are you not going to prepare at all? At least bring the painting?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: You want to know where that package is from?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: Yes. There's no sender or recipient, but it was clearly meant for me, so I wanted to know where it came from.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: It couldn't have just—
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: I'm sorry, but I don't remember handling this one at all.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: It wasn't there when I went through the checkpoint when I came in. Are you sure I delivered it?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: Don't worry though, I'll look it up. Might be some kind of anti-scam exercise from HR.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: Give me a moment.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: Where did you go?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: The Messenger who delivered it says he doesn't remember...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: I asked my friends. They know where it came from.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Where?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Follow the river and keep going. You'll see it.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: A stream, a forest, a wooden hut.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: You must be joking. How many streams are there in Terra?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: My friends gave me the location. I'll lead the way.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Alright, wait here...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Where are you going?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Fetching my brush and canvas.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Wait! One moment.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Let me catch my breath...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: How long have we been walking?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Days? Weeks?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Are you tired? Do you need me to carry your tools for you?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: No, I'm a painter. I can carry my own gear...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Are you thinking about picking up painting?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: I'd love to, but I couldn't learn it even if I tried.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Then help me get my paints ready. If we're taking a break, I want to use that time to paint something.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Still no good...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Even facing completely different scenery, Deepcolor still ends up drawing the scene from the painting.
What's wrong with the one you're painting now?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: I haven't drawn the hut yet, but... it's strange.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Why is it exactly the same, even when I'm using different paints?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Are you still copying?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Is it really copying if you're drawing natural scenery like it's real?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: That's called imitation.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Is that different?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Then shouldn't you be calling it imitation, rather than copying?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Stop confusing the concepts...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Look in front of you.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: On the other side of the canvas, Deepcolor finds herself looking at the scenery she had just depicted.
What's going on? I thought it was a meadow in front of us. Where did the stream come from?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: You draw well. It's exactly like nature.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Do we follow this stream to our destination?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Perhaps...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: This is getting stranger by the moment...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Can you help me put away the easel, assistant?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: What are you doubting, Deepcolor?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: This feels... familiar...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: That painting again?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: It's this place. The forest and the stream.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: This is the place the painting depicts...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: I see the wooden hut. The one in the painting.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: We're here...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Is this the place?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: It looks the same from where I am.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Let's go in, then.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: I'll wait for you at the door.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: You're not coming?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: I can't. I don't see the door.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Here's the door. Look, I opened it.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I still don't see anything.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: You go. I'll wait here.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Wait for me, then. I'll be back soon.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: No one has lived here for a long time. The furniture is battered and broken, paintings are scattered everywhere, and there is a thick layer of dust on everything.
She feels an intense familiarity. Not in an eerie sense like that painting, but one full of intimacy and yearning.
It's like...
Home?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Deepcolor picks up a painting and brushes away the dust, revealing the tattered truth.
When painting becomes life, life becomes poison.
There is no choice but to follow it downstream.
Trees, stream, hut... why are all the paintings the same?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Deepcolor takes a painting off the wall and blows away the past's shackles.
There is a paradise for painters in a faraway land...
Follow the stream, and you'll reach it.
*Cough* Isn't this an oval frame used for portraits? Why is it still the same?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Could the sketchbook be...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Deepcolor opens the sketchbook on the table. The pages flutter, revealing an aged warning.
The hand that cannot draw beauty, the heart that has never seen beauty. Heaven is out of reach, but self-destruction is near.
Follow the stream...
Every page is just the scenery outside.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Did the owner of this house go mad?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Well, she drew so many, so I might as well leave her this one.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: The painting makes a dull sound as it hit the ground.
It will be forgotten here, to be buried in the dust.
Until...
Her last painting becomes eternity.
You're back. Did you find anything?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: What about the painting?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: I left it inside. Didn't want to remember it anymore.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Can you paint now?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Here?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Won't I just end up drawing the same scenery again?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Only one way to find out.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: I guess you're right. I'll try.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: There.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Isn't it the same painting?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: No. Look, the lighting and angle here, and the application of colors, all different.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Something's missing...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: It's not a matter of technique... strange...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: ...You said your friends told you the painting came from here.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Yes. Is there a problem?
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Can your friends go inside the house?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: No, they can't.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Then, how did they know where the painting came from?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: 'Follow the stream. It lies at the very end.'
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: That's what they said.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: What lies at the end of the stream?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: What the owner of the house wanted.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Put this painting away for me, assistant.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: 'Supporter Operator'

attributes.content: Then, we can follow the stream.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: What lies at the end of the stream?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Do you still have water, assistant?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Only the seawater before us.
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: I'm hungry... tired... nobody would come here to paint...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Paint? Of course not.
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: They come to survive.
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: Look.
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: The assistant points towards a pile of scattered painting tools.
The paint is all dried up, and broken easel pieces litter the floor.
Poor thing...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: There is no place for her anywhere else.
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: Survival permits no impurity.
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: One must abandon everything else in order to survive.
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: Deepcolor sees a familiar picture frame amidst the reefs.
Broken, dying.
That's the painting from the package...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: She wanted to give it to me...
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: And I left it behind in the house?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Yes. You don't need it anymore.
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: Perhaps I should... leave a souvenir?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: We could send back the reproduction you made.
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: Let's do that.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: What about us?
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: We keep going.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: This is the end. Where are you going?
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: Deepcolor steps into the ocean.
The ocean took her, didn't it?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: One who has touched seawater can never go back.
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: Did she have a choice?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: 'Deacon'

attributes.content: Then neither do I. Am I wrong?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Let's go, assistant. What was started must be finished.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: It is not water that fills the oceans.
It is ink, paint, colors.
It seeps into every one of Deepcolor's nerve strands, wiping away all her emotions.
She becomes pure, perfect.
Many voices sing along with her, extolling the harmony of survival.
She ascends and tries to sing in harmony.
But she does not sing. She raises her brush.
The singing comes to an abrupt stop.
This is not how survival is expressed, Deepcolor.
attributes.name: 'Assistant'

attributes.content: I live. I must paint.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Painting does not protect. Painting does not nourish. It is illogical for survival.
attributes.name: 'Assistant'

attributes.content: Yes, but to paint is to live. How could I stop?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: The brush dips into the ink of the ocean, and colors fly through the water.
Have you forgotten why you embraced the ocean?
attributes.name: 'Assistant'

attributes.content: Of course I haven't. Giving up painting for survival, and meeting the end in bitter hatred.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: That's why she drowned. I'm alive. I must express.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: I won't abandon color, canvas, or brush. I'm not stopping anymore.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Draw with me, assistant.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: We must stockpile energy, overcome weakness, seek evolution.
attributes.name: 'Assistant'

attributes.content: Yes. We can paint even better.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: In evolution, this is a fallacy.
attributes.name: 'Assistant'

attributes.content: So what?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: I'm not heeding the call of the many. Whatever of me is left, I give to painting.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Stroke by stroke, she fills the sea with color.
Even the ocean could not stop her expression.
Seawater mixes with paint, separates, then mixes again, gradually leaving their mark on the ocean.
Come, assistant, this is a lot to do on my own.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Gather the colors to me. Don't let them disperse.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: What did you say? Our brethren are gone?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: It's their many. What has it to do with us, with me?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Is the palette ready? The ocean is waiting for us to color it!
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Are you there, assistant?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Assistant?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Phew. I guess I'll stop there.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Blocks of blue form the subject of the painting on her canvas.
This is our story. But was the last part a little too intense?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: The tentacles extending from the palette sway side to side, perhaps a sign of affirmation, or of denial.
The life of a Seaborn is so repressed, after all. Can't fault one for being a little radical in protesting it.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: That's it for this painting. Let's cover it up and put it through the process, or HR really will kick me off the ship once more operators complain.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: It was hard enough finding somewhere I can paint in peace, without having to deal with those things. I'd rather not be forced on the run again.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Hello! You've got a package!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: Coming!
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Operator Deepcolor? The stuff you ordered is here. Painting supplies and a picture frame.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Please check if everything is alright, then sign here.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: Here?
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: Yeah... hm.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: I thought you'd write in blue too.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: Ha.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Have a nice day!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: Thank you!
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Deepcolor

attributes.content: What should I paint next?
attributes.name: Deepcolor
